forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 40. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy, with a high near 50. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy. Low around 39, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
